words.source: H1931 (הוּא, 'he/it'), personal pronoun 3ms; KJV 'these are that', ESV 'these are the', NASB 'it was'
H175 (אַהֲרֹן, 'Aaron'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Aaron'
H4872 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'and Moses'
H834 relative pronoun (אֲשֶׁר, 'who, which, that'); KJV 'to whom', ESV 'to whom', NASB 'whom'
H559 Qal perfect 3ms of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
Preposition l- + 3mp pronominal suffix; KJV 'to them', ESV implied, NASB 'to them'
H3318 Hiphil imperative masculine plural of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'bring out', ESV 'bring out', NASB 'bring out'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1121 noun common masculine plural construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל, 'Israel'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Israel'
H776 prep. min + noun common feminine singular construct of אֶרֶץ 'land, earth'; KJV 'from the land of', ESV 'out of the land of', NASB 'from the land of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
H5921 (עַל, 'upon, over, according to'), preposition; KJV 'according to', ESV 'by', NASB 'by'

H6635 noun common masculine plural construct of צָבָא 'host, army' + 3mp suffix (צִבְאֹתָם, 'their armies/divisions'); significant term denoting organized military-like departure; KJV 'their armies', ESV 'their hosts', NASB 'their hosts'
